dict.string: Outgoing traffic destined for the local area network.

array.string: pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } to <BrickRFC1918>

dict.string: Outgoing traffic destined for this very computer.
Outgoing DNS requests, probably needed to resolve your remote VPN server

array.string: pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto { udp tcp } from any to any port domain

dict.string: Outgoing DHCP requests, useful if you have a USB stick modem.

array.string: pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto { udp tcp } from any port bootpc to any port bootps

dict.string: Establishment of L2TP over IPSec tunnels

array.string: pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto udp from any to any port { isakmp l2f ipsec-msft }
pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto esp from any to any
pass out on { tun0 ppp0 } all
pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto { udp tcp } from any to any port 64738
pass out on { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto { udp tcp } from any to any port { 443 1119 1120 3724 4000 6112 6113 6114 }
pass out { en0 en1 en2 en3 en4 } proto { udp } from any to any port { 33445 3389 }
